name: Turn One
description:
Turn One ~ The Turn-based strategy where you get one turn ~

Controls:

~ Use the mouse to click on units, then drag them on to the board

~ Build a good unit composition that will take down your opponent and press the "End Turn" button to watch the battle play out

~ Levels get harder and will make you think more the further the game goes on!

Extra Credits:

~ Royalty free music from Bensound.com

Developer Notes:

~ There is no reset button, so apologies for that - I was going to implement it but with 15 minutes of the jam left decided it wasn't worth the potential bugs

~ Although I find the dev assets cute in their own way, I would have liked to make actual 3D models and textures for everything, alas, my scope was a little too large for my current skill

~ Good luck to all the competitors!
